text: Interstate 840 (I-840) is a auxiliary Interstate Highway of I-40 in the U.S. state of North Carolina. The highway is the northern half of the larger Greensboro Urban Loop beltway around the city of Greensboro. It connects to a lot of other major highways, such as I-40, I-73, I-85, and I-785. ==References== 840 Category:Roads in North Carolina
title: Interstate 840 (North Carolina)
